hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Saeed:It was narrated from Abu Saeed that the Messenger of Allah(ﷺ) said: " If anyone of you is praying, he should not let anyone pass in front of him, and if he insists (on passing) then let him fight him

chapter.ara-name: باب التَّشْدِيدِ فِي الْمُرُورِ بَيْنَ يَدَىِ الْمُصَلِّي وَبَيْنَ سُتْرَتِهِ
chapter.eng-name: Stern warning against passing between a praying person and his Sutra
